channel.title: Need help with client background
channel.description:
i have the background on my client it its working perfectly but there are still the flames from like it was on old runescape
[IMG]http://i363.photobucket.com/albums/oo71/dman10345/0009.png[/img]
see the flames on the sides of the background, they are not on any picture file on my client. Does anyone know how to remove this?

item.title: Need help with client background
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

There are tons of tutorials about it use the search function

something like “Get rid of flames”

Read full topic
